DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this trial is to evaluate the safety and virological and immunological efficacy of ViramuneÂ® on a background of different antiretroviral drug combinations.
DOC.brief_title: PMS Assessing the Long-term Efficacy and Safety of Nevirapine Therapy (Combined With Other ARV Drugs) in HIV-1 Positive Patients in Daily Clinical Practice.
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: The inclusion criteria follow the same criteria which are describe in the newest SPC. Exclusion criteria: The exclusion criteria follow the same criteria which are describe in the newest SPC.
